title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1157.1 - Purpose and authority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1157.1 - Purpose and authority

State Regulations
(a) The
purpose of this Part is to establish such additional procedures as are
necessary for the implementation of the State Environmental Quality Review Act
(SEQR) by the Niagara Frontier Transportation Authority and its subsidiary
corporations which exist now or may be created at a later time. (b) The authority for the issuance of this

Part is contained in section 8-0107, article 8 of the State Environmental

Conservation Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1157.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
